医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
耗资 1250 万美元的研究旨在改善产后血压管理宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的研究人员正在启动一项耗资 1250 万美元的研究，旨在改善妊娠期高血压患者的产后血压管理和长期心血管健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/24125-million-study-aims-to-improve-postpartum-blood-Pressure-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/24125-million-study-aims-to-improve-postpartum-blood-Pressure-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16c15058-ccc1-49a7-bb37-44d3753cc21e Mon, 16 Dec 2024 20:35:55 -0500 $12.5 million study aims to improve postpartum blood pressure management
突破性发现可能会带来有效的金黄色葡萄球菌疫苗金黄色葡萄球菌（S. aureus）是皮肤和软组织感染的主要原因，有时会导致败血症和中毒性休克综合征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Breakthrough-discovery-could-lead-to- effective-vaccine-for-S-aureus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Breakthrough-discovery-could-lead-to- effective-vaccine-for-S-aureus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4846e85c-910e-4355-97de-c09ff775319c Mon, 16 Dec 2024 20:32:45 -0500 Breakthrough discovery could lead to effective vaccine for S. aureus
研究旨在预测和改善隐球菌感染的治疗最终的目标是找到方法来阻止新型隐球菌引起的致命疾病在人类和动物中发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Study-aims-to-predict-and-improve-treatment-for-Cryptococcus-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Study-aims-to-predict-and-improve-treatment-for-Cryptococcus-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7482d450-15df-464e-8372-e2854aa5da6a Mon, 16 Dec 2024 20:24:28 -0500 Study aims to predict and improve treatment for Cryptococcus infections
丹麦研究发现糖尿病药物两个独立的药物会增加视神经损伤的风险...南丹麦大学 (SDU) 的两项独立研究表明，接受 Ozempic 药物治疗的 2 型糖尿病患者眼睛视神经受损的风险增加，这可能导致严重且永久性的视力丧失。想象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Danish-studies-find-increased-risk-of-optic-nerve-damage-with-diabetes-medicine-Two-Independen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Danish-studies-find-increased-risk-of-optic-nerve-damage-with-diabetes-medicine-Two-Independen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5e9fee3-210e-45f2-baa6-4f3f05075e4c Mon, 16 Dec 2024 20:19:26 -0500 Danish studies find increased risk of optic nerve damage with diabetes medicine Two Independen...
均衡的早餐可改善老年人的心脏和代谢健康患有代谢综合征的老年人如果食用低能量或高能量早餐或低质量早餐，就会面临甘油三酯升高、体脂增加和肾功能恶化的问题。早餐提供每日 20-30% 的能量和优质营养素，可改善血脂和代谢健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Balanced-breakfasts-improve-heart-and-metabolic-health-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Balanced-breakfasts-improve-heart-and-metabolic-health-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba757db7-d223-4f20-a43b-a858247f354e Mon, 16 Dec 2024 17:32:00 -0500 Balanced breakfasts improve heart and metabolic health in older adults
AASM 敦促永久远程医疗覆盖以改善睡眠护理美国睡眠医学会发布了一份新的立场声明，倡导永久远程医疗覆盖，强调其在为睡眠障碍患者提供高质量、以患者为中心的护理方面的重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/AASM-urges-permanent-telehealth-coverage-for-improved-sleep-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/AASM-urges-permanent-telehealth-coverage-for-improved-sleep-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b961275c-adc3-44b7-87df-c81833f46763 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:32:34 -0500 AASM urges permanent telehealth coverage for improved sleep care
新药有望治疗杜氏肌营养不良症一种新药有望治疗杜氏肌营养不良症（DMD），这是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，会导致严重的肌肉退化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Novel-drug-holds-promise-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Novel-drug-holds-promise-for-treating-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39401873-537a-4bce-bc23-44705be17c87 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:25:08 -0500 Novel drug holds promise for treating Duchenne muscular dystrophy
凯斯勒基金会科学家获得老年人跌倒预防研究资助基兰·卡鲁纳卡兰 (Kiran Karunakaran) 博士是凯斯勒基金会移动与康复工程中心的研究科学家兼平衡评估和培训实验室主任，他获得了国家残疾、独立生活和康复研究所提供的为期三年、价值 599,998 美元的资助研究（NIDILRR）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Kessler-Foundation-scientist-receives-grant-for-fall-prevention-research-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Kessler-Foundation-scientist-receives-grant-for-fall-prevention-research-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=202ecc9c-772f-43ea-b22c-1dcfcf025ef9 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:13:28 -0500 Kessler Foundation scientist receives grant for fall prevention research in older adults
微生物胆汁酸以相反的方式影响结肠癌风险生活在我们肠道中的微生物通过重塑肝脏产生的用于分解脂肪的胆汁酸来帮助我们消化食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Microbial-bile-acids-affect-colon-cancer-risk-in-opposite-ways.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Microbial-bile-acids-affect-colon-cancer-risk-in-opposite-ways.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abb63065-ccb2-46e1-9296-8b8dd6874414 Mon, 16 Dec 2024 13:04:22 -0500 Microbial bile acids affect colon cancer risk in opposite ways
研究人员对导致雷特综合征的分子变化有了新的认识贝勒医学院、德克萨斯儿童医院 Jan 和 Dan Duncan 神经学研究所 (Duncan NRI) 及合作机构的研究人员对导致 Rett 综合征的分子变化有了新的认识，Rett 综合征是一种由 MeCP2 基因编码突变引起的严重神经系统疾病甲基-CpG 结合蛋白 2 (MeCP2)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Researchers-gain-new-insights-into-the-molecular-changes-leading-to-Rett-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241216/Researchers-gain-new-insights-into-the-molecular-changes-leading-to-Rett-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89a2e5c7-a79f-4e9d-ad17-96d11b92e56f Mon, 16 Dec 2024 12:57:42 -0500 Researchers gain new insights into the molecular changes leading to Rett syndrome
